alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 17 at 12:30PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow will affect northeastern Piscataquis... southern Aroostook and north central Penobscot Counties... At 1230 PM EST...An area of heavy snow across central Penobscot and northern Washington Counties was moving north at 40 MPH. Locations impacted include... Presque Isle, Caribou, Houlton, Fort Fairfield, Patten, Mount Katahdin, Clayton Lake, Ripogenus, Portage, Mapleton, Washburn, Mars Hill, Hodgdon, Ashland, Easton, Sherman, Island Falls, Bridgewater, Smyrna and Portage Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 260 and 304. US Highway 1 between Orient and Presque Isle. State Highway 11 between Stacyville and Portage. * Winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow. * Sudden and brief snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are possible in this area of heavy snow.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook
